Parfait .  
  
On va créer un fichier pour capturer tout les informations qui seront donc généralisée pour tout les autres OTAs. Assures toi de répérer le dossier des OTAs afin de commencer à capturer ces premières étapes..

### step 1 of 12 basicPropertyHotelier

### step 2 of 12 current contract

```markdown
# Your contract

You're one step closer to listing your property with us.

## What we do for you

Attract high-value travelers, including Expedia Group members and flight shoppers.

Generate global demand across 75 countries in 35 different languages.

Develop exclusive tools and provide support to help maximize your revenue potential.

## Special Terms

**No long-term commitment**

You can terminate this agreement for any reason by giving us 30 days prior written notice.

Agreement Type: **Expedia Traveler Preference**

Travelers have the option to pay you when they stay, or pay us when they book. This is the most flexible payment option and appeals to the widest range of travelers.

\*\*

16.50%

\*\*

**Compensation**

Expedia Group’s compensation percentage only applies to confirmed bookings.

\*\*

10%

\*\*

**Exclusive Traveler Discount**

A discount offered to exclusive traveler groups. These include loyalty program members, mobile app users, travelers purchasing packages (like rooms + flights, rooms + cars, etc.) and other high value groups.

By accepting, you acknowledge that you have read and agree to the Special Terms and the [General Terms](https://apps.expediapartnercentral.com/onboarding/contractSign/view?htid=114807934) and that you are authorized to enter into this Lodging Agreement.
```

### Cancellation policy options

A cancellation window is the amount of time before your local cancellation cutoff (**18:00**) on the day of check-in.

24-hour cancellation window

48-hour cancellation window

72-hour cancellation window

- Travelers who cancel 72 hours or more before 18:00 on the day of check-in are charged no fee.

- Travelers who cancel less than 72 hours before 18:00 on the day of check-in (including no-shows) are charged:

1st night + tax50% of booking amount100% of booking amountCancellation fee

Non-refundable

### Taxes and fees

Will these taxes be included in your room rate?

- 10.00% VAT (Value Added Tax)

Yes, taxes are included in rate

See an example :

f the tax is included in your rate, it will look like:

Rate you give us

100 MAD

Taxes/fees

Included

Traveler pays

100 MAD

No, add these taxes to the rate

See an example :

If the tax is not included in your rate, it would look like:

Rate you give us

80 MAD

Taxes/fees

20 MAD

Traveler pays

100 MAD

These taxes are collected from guests at the property.

- 3 MAD Taxe de Sejour
- 5 MAD Tourism Promotion Tax

If the standard taxes don’t apply to your property, our tax team can contact you to set up your taxes before we publish your listing.

- [x] Request tax team assistance

### 

What currency would you like to use to pay Expedia Group?

Your business model is Expedia Traveler Preference, meaning travelers have the flexibility to choose to pay you or Expedia Group first. Select a billing currency to ensure that your first payment is in your preferred currency.

SelectBritish Pounds SterlingEurosMoroccan DirhamsUS Dollars
